```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(shiny)

head(mtcars)
```

### Chart 

```{r}
renderPlotly(
      ggplotly(ggplot(filter(mtcars, cyl == input$my_cyl), aes(x = mpg, y = wt))+
                     geom_point())
)

```
